description.value:
You've learned to apply your flashy techniques to thrown weapons as easily as melee attacks.

When you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Panache]{Panache}, you apply your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Precise Strike] damage on ranged Strikes you make with a thrown weapon within that weapon's first range increment. The thrown weapon must be an agile or finesse weapon.

This also allows you to make a thrown weapon ranged Strike for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Confident Finisher] and any other finisher that includes a Strike that can benefit from your precise strike.
